segments.text: I ’ m interested in teaching at your school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Are you a qualified teacher ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of teaching certificate do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many years of experience do you have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have three years of teaching ESL and four years of teaching per-school children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you get your TEFL certificate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got my TEFL certificate three years ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you want to teach at our school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ Ve heard many good things about it . I also like teaching young children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great . Can you speak Chinese ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you come in for an interview tomorrow at 10:00 ?
segments.speaker: S2
